milestones.description: Initial setup and basic environment validation.
Implemented 'Part 2: Location of Missing Values' and 'Part 3: Insertion & Update' of the Roocode Superprompt, including generating a confidence matrix for .env variables.
Updated validate_llm_keys.py to include ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT, and GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY for validation.

Completed Phase 1: Foundational Stability and Security. This includes standardizing repository structure, formalizing GitHub workflow (branching, PRs, issue templates), integrating Google Secret Manager via Workload Identity Federation in GitHub Actions, refactoring application code for programmatic secret access, and updating relevant documentation.
